16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <ctype.h>
20#include <stdbool.h>
21
22#include <isc/buffer.h>
23#include <isc/hex.h>
24#include <isc/lex.h>
25#include <isc/string.h>
26#include <isc/util.h>
27
28#define RETERR(x) do { \
29 isc_result_t _r = (x); \
30 if (_r != ISC_R_SUCCESS) \
31 return (_r); \
32 } while (/*CONSTCOND*/0)
33
34
35/*
36 * BEW: These static functions are copied from lib/dns/rdata.c.
37 */
38static isc_result_t
39str_totext(const char *source, isc_buffer_t *target);
40
41static isc_result_t
42mem_tobuffer(isc_buffer_t *target, void *base, unsigned int length);
43
44static const char hex[] = "0123456789ABCDEF";
45
46isc_result_t
47isc_hex_totext(isc_region_t *source, int wordlength,
48 const char *wordbreak, isc_buffer_t *target)
49{
50 char buf[3];
51 unsigned int loops = 0;
52
53 if (wordlength < 2)
54 wordlength = 2;
55
56 memset(buf, 0, sizeof(buf));
57 while (source->length > 0) {
58 buf[0] = hex[(source->base[0] >> 4) & 0xf];
59 buf[1] = hex[(source->base[0]) & 0xf];
60 RETERR(str_totext(buf, target));
61 isc_region_consume(source, 1);
62
63 loops++;
64 if (source->length != 0 &&
65 (int)((loops + 1) * 2) >= wordlength)
66 {
67 loops = 0;
68 RETERR(str_totext(wordbreak, target));
69 }
70 }
71 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
72}
73
74/*%
75 * State of a hex decoding process in progress.
76 */
77typedef struct {
78 int length; /*%< Desired length of binary data or -1 */
79 isc_buffer_t *target; /*%< Buffer for resulting binary data */
80 int digits; /*%< Number of buffered hex digits */
81 int val[2];
82} hex_decode_ctx_t;
83
84static inline void
85hex_decode_init(hex_decode_ctx_t *ctx, int length, isc_buffer_t *target)
86{
87 ctx->digits = 0;
88 ctx->length = length;
89 ctx->target = target;
90}
91
92static inline isc_result_t
93hex_decode_char(hex_decode_ctx_t *ctx, int c) {
94 const char *s;
95
96 if ((s = strchr(hex, toupper(c))) == NULL)
97 return (ISC_R_BADHEX);
98 ctx->val[ctx->digits++] = (int)(s - hex);
99 if (ctx->digits == 2) {
100 unsigned char num;
101
102 num = (ctx->val[0] << 4) + (ctx->val[1]);
103 RETERR(mem_tobuffer(ctx->target, &num, 1));
104 if (ctx->length >= 0) {
105 if (ctx->length == 0)
106 return (ISC_R_BADHEX);
107 else
108 ctx->length -= 1;
109 }
110 ctx->digits = 0;
111 }
112 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
113}
114
115static inline isc_result_t
116hex_decode_finish(hex_decode_ctx_t *ctx) {
117 if (ctx->length > 0)
118 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND);
119 if (ctx->digits != 0)
120 return (ISC_R_BADHEX);
121 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
122}
123
124isc_result_t
125isc_hex_tobuffer(isc_lex_t *lexer, isc_buffer_t *target, int length) {
126 unsigned int before, after;
127 hex_decode_ctx_t ctx;
128 isc_textregion_t *tr;
129 isc_token_t token;
130 bool eol;
131
132 REQUIRE(length >= -2);
133
134 hex_decode_init(&ctx, length, target);
135
136 before = isc_buffer_usedlength(target);
137 while (ctx.length != 0) {
138 unsigned int i;
139
140 if (length > 0) {
141 eol = false;
142 } else {
143 eol = true;
144 }
145 RETERR(isc_lex_getmastertoken(lexer, &token,
146 isc_tokentype_string, eol));
147 if (token.type != isc_tokentype_string) {
148 break;
149 }
150 tr = &token.value.as_textregion;
151 for (i = 0; i < tr->length; i++) {
152 RETERR(hex_decode_char(&ctx, tr->base[i]));
153 }
154 }
155 after = isc_buffer_usedlength(target);
156 if (ctx.length < 0) {
157 isc_lex_ungettoken(lexer, &token);
158 }
159 RETERR(hex_decode_finish(&ctx));
160 if (length == -2 && before == after) {
161 return (ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND);
162 }
163 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
164}
165
166isc_result_t
167isc_hex_decodestring(const char *cstr, isc_buffer_t *target) {
168 hex_decode_ctx_t ctx;
169
170 hex_decode_init(&ctx, -1, target);
171 for (;;) {
172 int c = *cstr++;
173 if (c == '\0')
174 break;
175 if (c == ' ' || c == '\t' || c == '\n' || c== '\r')
176 continue;
177 RETERR(hex_decode_char(&ctx, c));
178 }
179 RETERR(hex_decode_finish(&ctx));
180 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
181}
182
183static isc_result_t
184str_totext(const char *source, isc_buffer_t *target) {
185 unsigned int l;
186 isc_region_t region;
187
188 isc_buffer_availableregion(target, &region);
189 l = strlen(source);
190
191 if (l > region.length)
192 return (ISC_R_NOSPACE);
193
194 memmove(region.base, source, l);
195 isc_buffer_add(target, l);
196 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
197}
198
199static isc_result_t
200mem_tobuffer(isc_buffer_t *target, void *base, unsigned int length) {
201 isc_region_t tr;
202
203 isc_buffer_availableregion(target, &tr);
204 if (length > tr.length)
205 return (ISC_R_NOSPACE);
206 memmove(tr.base, base, length);
207 isc_buffer_add(target, length);
208 return (ISC_R_SUCCESS);
209}
